Audio Description: An American GI holding up a tin mug of coffee is the picture on this poster that supports wartime rationing. The soldier taking a coffee break is pictured on a white background. He is wearing a green army helmet and a khaki shirt. The soldier is at ease with his shirt unbuttoned and the brown straps of his helmet hanging loose. He is holding the bent and battered mug that has been worn by use with his left hand as he is raising it to take a drink from the dull silver-colored mug. The soldier has dark eyebrows, blue eyes and he is smiling. On the upper left-hand corner of the poster in black type are the words: “Do with less - so they’ll have enough!” The word “they’ll” is underlined in red. A red bar runs across the bottom of the poster. In white capital letters in the red bar are words: “Rationing Gives You Your Fair Share.”
